nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.model.reader

Class XMLReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.basemodel.DictionaryReader
      • nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.model.reader.XMLReader

  • public class XMLReader
extends DictionaryReader
    Load a dictionary from a XMLReader file source. The loaded XMLReader file should contain a dimension of nodes. If more nodes are available per parent the first node will be interpreted to contain the words. The other nodes will be ignored.
    Since:
    2015
